title: Ridiculous Command Input LAG
body: I have just got back into playing LOL after a long time and enjoyed most of the new features i have seen. However while playing through the tutorial and doing some practice rounds against bots, I found myself screaming at the screen when my commands take 1-10 seconds to respond. I would find myself stuck being shot by a turret and spamming right click to get out of there but to no avail. Please help me with this issue ASAP becuase i really want to get back into this game but with a response time lag of a maximum 10 seconds, the game is virtually unplayable.
